Posts.Content: Recently diagnosed and offered lumpectomy and radiotherapy or mastectomy. I'm 58 and scared. How do you decide? I don't think I can cope with reconstruction. I have loads of support from family and friends but I just don't know how to decide? Thank you for letting me join the club!
